document_data.name: Daolani
document_data.size2e: Tiny<ref group="note">The sand gen's size is given as small in the source, but with one foot and less they are actually tiny.
document_data.mainbody: '''Daolani''', or '''sand gen''', were [[gen]] native to the [[Elemental Plane of Earth]]. They were also sometimes called '''earth gen'''.{{Cite dragon/315/The Return of the Sha'ir}}
document_data.Description: Sand gen had tanned skin and dark black hair. Their squat bodies made them appear almost circular in shape. Sand gen moved about with clunkiness.
document_data.Personality:
Daolani were the most direct of all gen. They were never shy about telling their [[Sha'ir|masters]] what they wanted. These selfish creatures lacked sympathy for anyone in trouble.

Unlike their cousins, the mighty [[dao]], these gen did not covet [[gems]] save for the occasional snack.
document_data.Notable Daolani: *[[Lil' Mountain]], a daolani familiar of the planeswalking [[dwarf|dwarvish]] [[sha'ir]] named [[Kursh Do Ran]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite organized play/LC/Impendant Symposium|34}}
